text: The Great Train Robbery was a £2.6 million train robbery that took place on 8 August 1963 at Bridego Railway Bridge, Ledburn, Buckinghamshire. The gang was led by Bruce Reynolds (1931–2013).The Great Train Robbery Other members of the gang included Buster Edwards (1931–1994), Brian Field (1934–1979), Charlie Wilson (1932–1990), Ronnie Biggs (1929–2013), and Gordon Goody (1930–2016). == References == Category:1960s crimes Category:1963 in the United Kingdom Category:Buckinghamshire Category:Crime in the United Kingdom Category:Robberies
title: Great Train Robbery (1963)
